name: Eternal Horizon (edbucks)
description:
A crazed dictator has seized control of the USA. Civilization as we know it has collapsed. Young people are falling into poverty because they spent all their money on a chai latte and a slice of avocado toast.

This is no dystopia. This is 2019 and YOU WISH YOU WERE BACK IN THE EIGHTIES.

Eternal Horizon awaits.

Controls

Arrow keys to move

Enter to make menu selections

Spacebar to fire

Credits

Graphics by Jay Korvus

Music, sound design and additional graphics by Ellie Korvus

Visual Studio wrangling by edbucks
